== About Me ==
I am 28 years old and I live in Barcelona (north of Spain).
I received my M.Sc. degree in telecommunications engineering (a 5 years degree) in
2007 from the Universitat Polit√®cnica de Catalunya (UPC). 

=== Contributions ===
I am dedicated to detect software failures so that the corresponding defects regarding to the  <nowiki>[[http://zet.aluzina.org/index.php/Zet_processor|Zet Processor]]</nowiki>. The Zet processor is an open implementation of the so widely used IA-32 architecture (generally called x86). Mainly, I am the Zet bios software tester and the coordinator of the most stable applications that ZET can properly execute. Additionally,
I also report the discovered bugs to the ZET community in order to be corrected.

I am also a certified software tester by ISTQB and I am an external advisor for the Judicial Court as telecom expert part on legal disputes. Specifically, I provide an expert opinion on the technological matters raised in a legal dispute between two parties. Those parties are companies like Telefonica, Vodafone or Telecom Italia.
